content: Hi! I'd like an ability to create patient records to the FIPHR sandbox & get the associated bearer token in order to create automation tests. Has someone already implemented this capability (or do I need to do this by screen scraping the sandbox oauth user interface)?

Hi, it seems there hasn't been anyone else who's done this against Sandbox. @Sulka Haro have you already started working on this? We at Kela can try to see whether we could provide you something based on Kela's own automation tests.
